Direct Known Subclasses:

public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
A class to store a card

    • isCompatible

      public boolean isCompatible​(Card previous)
      check if this card is compatible with previous one(color or number is same?)
      Parameters:
      previous - the card we want to check if tis card is compatible with
      Returns:
      true if these two card have same color or number or both
